missionSuccessStatementOverride: Good job, Commander. You got their attention.
shortDescription:
Mozen City is one of the few surface cities on Setubal with relatively moderate temperatures. Importantly, it serves as a financial hub, hosting the planetary headquarters of several major companies.

Our next target is Mozen's Stock Exchange, specifically its server facilities.
longDescription: Server facilities linked to financial institutions tend to be heavily guarded.

objectiveList.title: Reach the server facility
objectiveList.description: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Enemy Force
objectiveList.description: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

objectiveList.title: Capture the inner yard
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to move into and capture the facility.

objectiveList.title: Repel the enemy counterattack.
objectiveList.description: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

objectiveList.title: Secure the area around the facility
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

objectiveList.title: Repel the Enemy Counterattack.
objectiveList.description: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

objectiveList.title: Disable Auto-Turrets
objectiveList.description: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

dialogueContent.words: We are here to start a financial downturn for the local Kuritan administration.
The facility maintains the standard garrison complement, reinforced by turrets â€” nothing our team has not seen before.
Eliminate opposition and take the facility, Commander.
Our infantry assets are being unloaded, Commander.
We'll be ready to extract the ground team in ten minutes.
I think Lyrans will be satisfied with this operation.
We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
When you clean the area around the facility, we'll start landing the infantry down there.
Sensors seem clear, proceed to the facility.
Clear the area! Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
<color=#FAD02C>Attention, attention! This is not a test! Hostile forces have landed on the Morenzi Plaza. All civilians are to head to the shelters.</color>
The team has reached the Nav Point Alpha and are checking in.
Ground team - be aware that we are seeing enemy 'Mech forces heading to your position. Armor units are moving to cut you off.
